comment: Hello Matt! I'm a young adult personal finance enthusiast and I'm also a part of the post-YNAB crew. Thanks for creating such an amazing piece of software. I think your story is awesome. I don't make much money now, but I will use Buckets to save small chunks of my income so I can pay for a license. Cheers! ğŸ¤™ğŸ¾
